member.name: T:System.RandomExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods collection of .

member.name: M:System.RandomExtensions.NextDouble(System.Random,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns a random double that is within a specific range.
member.param: The to return a randome double.
The inclusive lower bound of the random number returned.
The exclusive upper bound of the random number returned. maxValue must be greater than or equal to minValue.
member.returns: A double greater than or equal to minValue and less than maxValue; that is, the range of return values includes minValue but not maxValue. If minValue equals maxValue, minValue is returned.

member.name: M:System.RandomExtensions.NextLong(System.Random,System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns a random 64-bit signed integer that is within a specific range.
member.param: The to return a randome 64-bit signed integer.
The inclusive lower bound of the random number returned.
The exclusive upper bound of the random number returned. maxValue must be greater than or equal to minValue.
member.returns: A 64-bit signed integer greater than or equal to minValue and less than maxValue; that is, the range of return values includes minValue but not maxValue. If minValue equals maxValue, minValue is returned.

member.name: M:System.RandomExtensions.NextSingle(System.Random,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Returns a random single that is within a specific range.
member.param: The to return a single double.
The inclusive lower bound of the random number returned.
The exclusive upper bound of the random number returned. maxValue must be greater than or equal to minValue.
member.returns: A single greater than or equal to minValue and less than maxValue; that is, the range of return values includes minValue but not maxValue. If minValue equals maxValue, minValue is returned.
